name: General Checkup
description: Comprehensive examination to assess overall health.
service_details: Comprehensive health assessment covering vital signs, blood tests, and physical examination. Identifies potential health risks and provides personalized advice for a proactive approach to well-being and preventive care.

name: Blood Pressure Monitoring
description: Regular monitoring and management of blood pressure.
service_details: Regular monitoring of blood pressure levels with personalized guidance on lifestyle modifications and medications. Empowering patients to maintain optimal blood pressure, reducing the risk of cardiovascular complications.

description: Expert consultation and administration of vaccinations.
